abstract: Metropolitan Opera, unlike several other world-class opera companies, continues not to offer Sunday performances; general manager Peter Gelb is seeking deal with labor unions that would allow Sunday shows, which could draw new audiences, but says it is too late to organize them for coming season.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera has found that Friday and Saturday performances regularly outsell weeknights, but it is unable to institute Sunday performances next season.

headline.main: Sunday Performances Continue to Elude the Met
headline.print_headline: Sunday Performances  Still Elude the Met

snippet: The Metropolitan Opera has found that Friday and Saturday performances regularly outsell weeknights, but it is unable to institute Sunday performances next season.
